General.Name: KBC Corporation Ltd
General.Description: KBC Corporation, Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of carbon -based composites materials and products in China and internationally. The company's products include various specifications of crucibles, guide tubes, insulation tubes, etc. that are components of the thermal field systems of single crystal silicon pulling furnaces; and various customized products. Its products are used in photovoltaic and semiconductor, lithium battery, hydrogen energy, carbon-ceramic, vacuum heat treatment metallurgy and high-temperature thermal, mechanical seal/wear-resistant, high-temperature and high-pressure forming, electrochemistry, and other fields. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Yiyang, China.
General.Address: No. 2 Yingbin West Road, Yiyang, China, 413000
